backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing providers, user profiles, custom provider metadata, and access control with admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, and test requirements for error handling and readiness improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, pages, and hooks related to provider navigation, error handling, and backend readiness.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling for the application.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting up the root DOM node and loading the main React entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router with provider-specific pages, authentication gating, and global layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Component enforcing Internet Identity authentication before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth state and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting authenticated users without a saved profile to enter their name and stores it locally.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatbotComm: Provides a chat UI for interacting with a provider, handling message sending, drafts, scrolling, and backend readiness.
frontend/src/components/common/BackendCo: Displays connection errors with suggested actions and options to retry, log in, or reload.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorBoun: Catches component errors and displays a fallback UI with reset capability.
frontend/src/components/common/NotIntegr: Shows a simple alert indicating a feature is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/keys/ProviderKey: Manages provider API keys, including loading, saving, editing, and handling backend connection issues.
Defines the main application layout with nav bars, outlet rendering, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobilePro: Renders a mobile drawer listing AI providers and navigating between their routes.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileTop: Implements a mobile top navigation menu with links to core app sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive top navigation bar with links, mobile menu toggle, and login button.
frontend/src/components/providers/Provid: Guards provider actions by checking backend connection and API key status before rendering children.
Sidebar listing all AI providers with navigation links and resolved display names.
Renders configurable tool option fields and workflow-specific tool cards based on provider settings.
frontend/src/components/providers/Recomm: Displays a list of suggested prompts users can click to insert into the command input.
Provides chat message fetching and sending for a provider using backend actor and react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/keys/useProviderKey.t: Checks if a provider API key exists and provides a mutation for saving or updating it.
frontend/src/hooks/providers/useCustomPr: Fetches and saves custom display metadata for provider entries via actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/providers/useResolved: Returns a provider's display name, preferring custom metadata when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Manages backend actor creation with connection state, error handling, and retry support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch the caller's user profile and admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base styles and defines light/dark theme variables for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel UI, checking admin permissions and showing feature placeholders for future tools.
frontend/src/pages/KeyVaultPage.tsx: Displays a dashboard for managing API keys across providers, showing key status and links to configuration pages.
frontend/src/pages/LinksDashboardPage.ts: Shows a placeholder UI for future CRUD management of external links.
frontend/src/pages/MemoryBrainPage.tsx: Provides a placeholder interface for the planned RAG-based memory system called Empire Brain.
frontend/src/pages/ProviderHubPage.tsx: Lists AI providers with capabilities and links to their command centers in a card-based layout.
frontend/src/pages/providers/CustomSlotP: Renders a customizable provider page allowing users to edit display names, manage keys, use prompts, and access chat/tools sections.
frontend/src/pages/providers/GenericProv: A generic provider template showing capabilities, key management, prompts, and chat/workflow tools with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/providers/LTXPage.tsx: Provider page for LTX with key input, recommended prompts, chat, and optional workflow tools.
OpenAI provider page with chat, image generation, and analysis tabs alongside key management and prompts.
frontend/src/pages/providers/ReplicatePa: Replicate provider page offering key management, prompts, chat, and any workflow tool options.
RunPod provider page enabling key setup, recommended prompts, chat, and workflow tool configuration.
frontend/src/pages/providers/SlackPage.t: Slack provider page with key management, prompts, chat interface, and optional workflow tool settings.
frontend/src/pages/StudioToolsPage.tsx: Displays placeholder cards for upcoming studio tools like Motion Brush, Magic Script, and Generation History.
frontend/src/providers/providers.ts: Defines provider configuration types and an array of provider metadata including capabilities, routes, and option fields for the UI.
Provides utilities to detect and classify backend errors and return user-friendly messages with suggested actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, typography, and other theme settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s architecture, known issues, and feature requirements for a provider‑centric AI app UI.
